msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto;Three lines on Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides. kollesis at the beginning of col. 142. The column is badly damaged at the top and the bottom. The Papyrus is also broken vertically at a result of two folds, as well as there are traces of four horizontal folds. A strip of fibers is removed as a result of one of these folds. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated the new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer and marking an oblique stroke going downwards to the left margin in other lines.
